body_html:
I think this is still not a well-defined feature request. There aren't even any examples of (input, output) pairs at all. The input, output pairs given in the original issue are already proven unsound by @burglarhobbit.

If one just wants to replace False entries by another element (which seems to be what @panfengli needs) then you should use tf.where.

body:
I think this is still not a well-defined feature request. There aren't even any examples of (input, output) pairs at all. The input, output pairs given in the original issue are already proven unsound by @burglarhobbit.

If one just wants to replace False entries by another element (which seems to be what @panfengli needs) then you should use `tf.where`.
